mapper.select: SELECT di.offerId,d.num,d.tourist,d.travelStartTime,d.travelEndTime,bi.picturePath FROM `disguide` di INNER JOIN dispatch d ON di.offerId=d.dispatchId INNER JOIN bill bi ON bi.dispatchId=d.dispatchId INNER JOIN billtype bt ON bt.billTypeId=bi.billTypeId WHERE di.disGuideId=1 AND NOW() >d.travelEndTime AND bt.typeName='集体照'
